name: The Southern Front
description:
In development, here is what you can do:

Create, save, load maps.

Build structures:

-Click on node, press build, select structure

Build roads:  select node, press on road

Recruit generals and troops:

-Press "War", press one or more commanders to open their Garrison, where you can recruit troops for them. If two commanders are open, you can move troops around by dragging on the image

-Select node, press "Garrison", and "Add commander". 

-Nodes that have commanders in them display them, press the node to zoom in

Fully functional economy system, with turns etc.
